title: Ore no Real to Netgame ga Love Comedy ni Shinshokusare Hajimete Yabai - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Brother Complex   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   MMORPG   Virtual Reality
author: Aru Fujitani   藤谷ある
description: Sagimiya Keita is a heavy gamer of MMORPG without experience with girls. In his favorite game, he controls a female character, like most of the members of his guild. But when it comes to offline meetings, Keita plays the role of the “The Knight-sama”, the only male character of the guild. He became famous in real life as in virtual life! The romantic comedy between the real world and the virtual one begins!>
